jobDescription: PlayStation isnt just the Best Place to Play its also the Best Place to Work. Weve thrilled gamers since 1994, when we launched the original PlayStation. Today, were recognized as a global leader in interactive and digital entertainment. The PlayStation brand falls under Sony Interactive Entertainment, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Sony Corporation. Staff Software Engineer, Analytics (Front End)San Francisco, CA PlayStation has an immediate opening for a world-class software engineer to join our User Experience Analytics team and help deliver the next generation of analytics infrastructure that will monitor metrics from millions of users around the world. We are fun, diverse group of people passionate about creating the best place to play. We are looking for people who are passionate about visualization of telemetry data, modern software tools/paradigms and are focused on continual improvement in the delivery of high quality web applications for PlayStation customers. This is an opportunity to be part of one of the worlds most recognizable brands and see your work impact millions. We are located in San Francisco's vibrant SOMA district, within walking distance to great restaurants, museums and nightlife.
